overview:
SUN FLASH INFOTECH is an affordable and reliable Computer Sales and Service Pollachi since 2008. We support Individuals, Small / Medium / Corporate companies for all type of computer needs.Our clients are mainly based in Pollachi, Udumalpet, Valparai, Palladam,Pazhani and Tamilnadu NRIs.

We only deal with recognized branded products which come with full manufacturers warranty - its just one of the ways we can give true value to our customers.Our success and growth cant happen without you and we promise never to forget our commitments. You wont find any unbranded, unreliable products on our website or in our store!

“A customer is the most important visitor on our premises. He is not dependent on us. We are dependent on him. He is not an interruption on our work. He is the purpose of it. He is not an outsider on our business. He is a part of it. We are not doing him a favour by serving him. He is doing us a favor by giving us an opportunity to do”.
